item.title: CVE-2024-7384|2024-08-22T02:02:02.326Z -- acyba -- acymailing%20%E2%80%93%20an%20ultimate%20newsletter%20plugin%20and%20marketing%20automation%20solution%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The AcyMailing â€“ An Ultimate Newsletter Plugin and Marketing Automation Solution for WordPress plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to missing file type validation in the acym_extractArchive function in all versions up to, and including, 9.7.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to upload arbitrary files on the affected site's server which may make remote code execution possible.
